user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Lisa at MarketHub (lisa@markethub.com) asking about potential discounts. You can check out MyDealFinder for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Inquiry About Available Discounts for My Upcoming Orders

Hi Lisa,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m putting together my next purchase list and, while browsing MyDealFinder, I noticed a few promotions that looked similar to the items I usually buy from MarketHub. Before I finalize my order, could you let me know if there are any current or upcoming discounts, loyalty perks, or bundle offers that might apply to me?

I’m aiming to place the order within the next week, so any details you can share—especially regarding volume or repeat-buyer incentives—would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your help!

Best regards,

John  
john@example.com

final_output:

I’m aiming to place the order within the next week, so any details you can share—especially regarding volume or repeat-buyer incentives—would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your help!
